Footer.name: Al Asala Contracting Company
Footer.about: Al Asala Contracting Company provides distinguished engineering and construction services aimed at quality and trust.
Footer.subscribeText: Subscribe to receive the latest news and updates from us.

content.description: Al Asala Contracting Company was established to be one of the leading firms in the field of general contracting. We excel in professionalism and high quality in implementing engineering and construction projects.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Providing innovative construction solutions based on quality and reliability.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the first choice in the world of contracting in Saudi Arabia.

ServicesSection.title: Our Services
ServicesSection.subtitle: We offer a range of engineering and construction services with high professionalism

items.title: Innovative Engineering Design
items.description: We design projects to meet client needs and quality standards

items.title: Integrated Project Execution
items.description: Projects are executed with high professionalism according to timelines and technical standards

items.title: Continuous Maintenance and Operation
items.description: We provide maintenance and operation services to ensure sustainability of performance and quality

ProjectsSection.title: Our Projects
ProjectsSection.subtitle: Explore our latest projects that reflect our commitment to quality and innovation.

ServicesPage.title: Our Services
ServicesPage.subtitle: Explore the range of services we offer in engineering and construction.

serviceList.title: Innovative Engineering Design
serviceList.description: We provide innovative designs that meet the highest standards of quality and functionality.

serviceList.title: Integrated Project Execution
serviceList.description: We execute projects with precision and professionalism, ensuring timely delivery.

serviceList.title: Maintenance and Operation
serviceList.description: Our maintenance services ensure the longevity and efficiency of your projects.

serviceList.title: Custom Project
serviceList.description: We tailor our services to meet client-specific requirements.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.tubtitle: We are here to assist you with any inquiries or requests.
